tanks.description: Advanced heavy tank, thick armor angled for driving dirrectly toward the enemies of Stallin
Heavy tank, armored is thick but flat. Mechanically complex
Fast and Stealthy, Best used for scouting as its armor is no match for higher caliber hits
This medium tank is well rounded, possesing speed and a rapid firing weapon. Best used to flank enemies
The armor is rather weak on this tank, but its a porduct of mass production.
The thickess armor you will find on the battlefield, however its also the slowest
Quick and open topped, this is actually a tank destroyer, not a tank. A hunter killer armed with speed and a 76mm cannon
